articles.author: Pia Singh, Alex Harring
articles.title: Nasdaq falls for a second day as tech struggles again: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks dipped on Wednesday, pressured by a broad decline in technology stocks for the second day in a row.
articles.content: Stocks dipped on Wednesday, pressured by a broad decline in tech for the second day in a row. Investors also monitored a mixed batch of retail earnings and looked ahead to the Federal Reserve's lates… [+2134 chars]
